modules.title: Web Framework Fundamentals
modules.description: This module introduces core concepts underpinning modern web frameworks, including the DOM, rendering strategies, and basic JavaScript patterns.

topics.title: Overview
topics.description: Course introduction and objectives.

topics.title: The Document Object Model (DOM)
topics.description: Understanding the DOM tree structure and manipulation.

topics.title: Virtual DOM
topics.description: Introduction to the virtual DOM concept and its benefits.

topics.title: Rendering Strategies: SSR, CSR, and SSG
topics.description: Server-side rendering, client-side rendering, and static site generation.

topics.title: JavaScript Design Patterns
topics.description: Common JavaScript patterns used in web framework development.

topics.title: Module Bundlers: Webpack, Parcel, and Rollup
topics.description: Overview of module bundlers and their role in web development.

topics.title: Transpilation with Babel
topics.description: Using Babel to transpile modern JavaScript code.

topics.title: Code Optimization Techniques
topics.description: Techniques for optimizing JavaScript code for performance.

topics.title: Accessibility Considerations
topics.description: Building web applications with accessibility in mind.

topics.title: Security Best Practices
topics.description: Common security vulnerabilities and how to prevent them.

topics.title: Testing Strategies
topics.description: Unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

topics.title: Debugging Techniques
topics.description: Debugging JavaScript code in the browser and IDE.

topics.title: Version Control with Git
topics.description: Using Git for version control and collaboration.

topics.title: Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD)
topics.description: Automating the build, test, and deployment process.

topics.title: Performance Monitoring
topics.description: Tools and techniques for monitoring web application performance.

modules.title: React Framework Deep Dive
modules.description: Detailed exploration of the React framework, including JSX, components, state management, and hooks.

topics.title: React Introduction and JSX
topics.description: Introduction to React and the JSX syntax.

topics.title: React Components: Functional vs. Class
topics.description: Functional and class-based React components.

topics.title: Props and State
topics.description: Understanding props and state in React components.

topics.title: React Lifecycle Methods
topics.description: Lifecycle methods in class-based React components.

topics.title: React Hooks: useState, useEffect, useContext
topics.description: Introduction to React Hooks for managing state and side effects.

topics.title: Conditional Rendering
topics.description: Rendering different content based on conditions.

topics.title: List Rendering
topics.description: Rendering lists of data in React.

topics.title: Form Handling
topics.description: Handling forms and user input in React.

topics.title: React Router
topics.description: Implementing routing in React applications.

topics.title: Redux for State Management
topics.description: Using Redux for managing application state in React.

topics.title: Context API
topics.description: Using the Context API for state management.

topics.title: Styled Components
topics.description: Styling React components with styled-components.

topics.title: Material UI
topics.description: Using Material UI for pre-built React components.

topics.title: Testing React Components
topics.description: Testing React components with Jest and Enzyme.

topics.title: React Performance Optimization
topics.description: Optimizing React applications for performance.

topics.title: Next.js Framework
topics.description: Introduction to the Next.js framework for server-side rendering and static site generation.

modules.title: Vue.js Framework Deep Dive

topics.title: Vue Components

topics.description: Introduction to the Nuxt.js framework for server-side rendering and static site generation.

modules.title: Building Your Own Web Framework
modules.description: This module guides you through the process of creating a custom web framework, implementing core features like component rendering, state management, and reactivity.

modules.title: Capstone Project: Modern Web Application Development
modules.description: Apply the knowledge gained throughout the course to develop a modern web application using the custom-built web framework. This project integrates all concepts and demonstrates mastery of web framework programming.
